===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|おおかみ|yomi=k}}
{{IPAchar|/opokami/}} → {{IPAchar|/oɸokami/}} → {{IPAchar|/owokami/}} → {{IPAchar|/oːkami/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=おおかみ}}. Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おおかみ|大|tr1=opo</i>, modern <i>ō|t1=great|神|tr2=kami|t2=god, spirit}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おおかみ|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|おおかみ|オオカミ|hhira=おほかみ|count=匹}}

# [[wolf|wolf]]; ''Canis lupus''
#* {{RQ:Shin'yaku Kegonkyō Ongi Shiki}}
#*: 狐狼 上扈反, 倭言岐都禰, 又狐諼獸鬼所乘有三徳, 狐疑不定也, 狼音良, 訓, 似犬也, 倭言'''大神'''也
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|7|56}}
#*: 犲狼 [...] 説文云、狼、音郎、'''於保加美'''、和名二字、本草和名、犲皮、和名'''於保加美'''、雄略紀、豺狼二字同訓、貝原氏曰、狼、'''於保加美''' [...]
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|18|17}} (Shinpukuji manuscript)
#*: 犲狼: 兼名苑云狼一名犲音於説文云狼音即和名'''於保加美'''似犬而銃頭白頬者也爾雅注云獥音叫狼子也
#* c. '''1177-1188''': [[w:Iroha Jiruishō|Iroha Jiruishō]]
#*: 狼（オホカミ）
#* '''1444''': [[w:Kagakushū|Kagakushū]] (Volume 13)
#*: 狼（ヲヽカミ）

===Etymology 2===
Alteration from ''ōkami'' above. Appears in the [[w:Kamakura period|Kamakura period]].<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=k|おおかめ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|おおかめ|hhira=おほかめ}}

# [[wolf]]; ''Canis lupus''
#* '''1593:''' ''Esopono fabulas'' ([[w:Aesop's Fables|Aesop's Fables]]), "Vôcameto, fitcujino tatoyeno coto"
#*: Aru cauabatani '''vôcame'''mo, fitcujimo mizzuuo nomuni, [...]
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|697}}
#*: '''Vôcame'''. ヲゥカメ (狼) 狼.
#* '''1632:''' [[w:Diego Collado|Diego Collado]], ''Dictionarium Sive Thesauri Linguae Iaponicae Compendium'', page 75
#*: ''Lupus, i: lobo:'' yàmàinu. ''vel,'' '''vocame''''':''
